problem_names:
lemma horner_eval_cong:
  assumes "\<And>i. i < n \<Longrightarrow> f i = g i"
  assumes "x = y"
  assumes "n = m"
  shows "horner_eval f x n = horner_eval g y m"

lemma horner_eval_eq_setsum:
  fixes x::"'a::linordered_idom"
  shows "horner_eval f x n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x^i)"

lemma horner_eval_Suc[simp]:
  fixes x::"'a::linordered_idom"
  shows "horner_eval f x (Suc n) = horner_eval f x n + (f n) * x^n"

lemma horner_eval_Suc'[simp]:
  fixes x::"'a::{comm_monoid_add, times}"
  shows "horner_eval f x (Suc n) = f 0 + x * (horner_eval (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x n)"

lemma horner_eval'_interval:
  fixes x::"'a::linordered_ring"
  assumes "\<And>i. i < n \<Longrightarrow> f i \<in> set_of (g i)"
  assumes "x \<in>\<^sub>i I" "v \<in>\<^sub>i V"
  shows "horner_eval' f x v n \<in>\<^sub>i horner_eval' g I V n"

lemma horner_eval_interval:
  fixes x::"'a::linordered_idom"
  assumes "\<And>i. i < n \<Longrightarrow> f i \<in> set_of (g i)"
  assumes "x \<in> set_of I"
  shows "horner_eval f x n \<in>\<^sub>i horner_eval g I n"
translations:
lemma horner_eval_cong:
  assumes "\<And>i. i < n \<Longrightarrow> f i = g i"
  assumes "x = y"
  assumes "n = m"
  shows "horner_eval f x n = horner_eval g y m"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n = horner_eval g y m
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n = horner_eval g y m

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n = horner_eval g y m
fix v

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n = horner_eval g y m
have "horner_eval' f x v n = horner_eval' g x v n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval' f x v n = horner_eval' g x v n
using assms(1)

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?i < n \<Longrightarrow> f ?i = g ?i

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval' f x v n = horner_eval' g x v n
by (induction n arbitrary: v, simp_all)

proof (state)
this:
  horner_eval' f x v n = horner_eval' g x v n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n = horner_eval g y m

proof (state)
this:
  horner_eval' f x ?v2 n = horner_eval' g x ?v2 n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n = horner_eval g y m
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  horner_eval' f x ?v2 n = horner_eval' g x ?v2 n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n = horner_eval g y m
by (simp add: assms(2,3) horner_eval_def)

proof (state)
this:
  horner_eval f x n = horner_eval g y m

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma horner_eval_eq_setsum:
  fixes x::"'a::linordered_idom"
  shows "horner_eval f x n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x^i)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x ^ i)
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x ^ i)

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x ^ i)
fix v

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x ^ i)
have "horner_eval' f x v n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x^i) + v * x^n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval' f x v n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x ^ i) + v * x ^ n
by (induction n arbitrary: v, simp_all add: distrib_left mult.commute)

proof (state)
this:
  horner_eval' f x v n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x ^ i) + v * x ^ n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x ^ i)

proof (state)
this:
  horner_eval' f x ?v2 n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x ^ i) + ?v2 * x ^ n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x ^ i)
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  horner_eval' f x ?v2 n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x ^ i) + ?v2 * x ^ n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x ^ i)
by (simp add: horner_eval_def)

proof (state)
this:
  horner_eval f x n = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x ^ i)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma horner_eval_Suc[simp]:
  fixes x::"'a::linordered_idom"
  shows "horner_eval f x (Suc n) = horner_eval f x n + (f n) * x^n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x (Suc n) = horner_eval f x n + f n * x ^ n
unfolding horner_eval_eq_setsum

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<Sum>i<Suc n. f i * x ^ i) = (\<Sum>i<n. f i * x ^ i) + f n * x ^ n
by simp

lemma horner_eval_Suc'[simp]:
  fixes x::"'a::{comm_monoid_add, times}"
  shows "horner_eval f x (Suc n) = f 0 + x * (horner_eval (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x n)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x (Suc n) =
    f 0 + x * horner_eval (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x n
proof-

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x (Suc n) =
    f 0 + x * horner_eval (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x n

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x (Suc n) =
    f 0 + x * horner_eval (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x n
fix v

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x (Suc n) =
    f 0 + x * horner_eval (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x n
have "horner_eval' f x v (Suc n) = f 0 + x * horner_eval' (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x v n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval' f x v (Suc n) =
    f 0 + x * horner_eval' (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x v n
by (induction n arbitrary: v, simp_all)

proof (state)
this:
  horner_eval' f x v (Suc n) =
  f 0 + x * horner_eval' (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x v n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x (Suc n) =
    f 0 + x * horner_eval (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x n

proof (state)
this:
  horner_eval' f x ?v2 (Suc n) =
  f 0 + x * horner_eval' (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x ?v2 n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x (Suc n) =
    f 0 + x * horner_eval (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x n
thus ?thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  horner_eval' f x ?v2 (Suc n) =
  f 0 + x * horner_eval' (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x ?v2 n

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x (Suc n) =
    f 0 + x * horner_eval (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x n
by (simp add: horner_eval_def)

proof (state)
this:
  horner_eval f x (Suc n) =
  f 0 + x * horner_eval (\<lambda>i. f (Suc i)) x n

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemma horner_eval_0[simp]:
  shows "horner_eval f x 0 = 0"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x 0 = (0::'a)
by (simp add: horner_eval_def)

lemma horner_eval'_interval:
  fixes x::"'a::linordered_ring"
  assumes "\<And>i. i < n \<Longrightarrow> f i \<in> set_of (g i)"
  assumes "x \<in>\<^sub>i I" "v \<in>\<^sub>i V"
  shows "horner_eval' f x v n \<in>\<^sub>i horner_eval' g I V n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval' f x v n \<in>\<^sub>i horner_eval' g I V n
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?i < n \<Longrightarrow> f ?i \<in>\<^sub>i g ?i
  x \<in>\<^sub>i I
  v \<in>\<^sub>i V

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval' f x v n \<in>\<^sub>i horner_eval' g I V n
by (induction n arbitrary: v V) (auto intro!: plus_in_intervalI times_in_intervalI)

lemma horner_eval_interval:
  fixes x::"'a::linordered_idom"
  assumes "\<And>i. i < n \<Longrightarrow> f i \<in> set_of (g i)"
  assumes "x \<in> set_of I"
  shows "horner_eval f x n \<in>\<^sub>i horner_eval g I n"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval f x n \<in>\<^sub>i horner_eval g I n
unfolding horner_eval_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval' f x (0::'a) n \<in>\<^sub>i horner_eval' g I 0 n
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?i < n \<Longrightarrow> f ?i \<in>\<^sub>i g ?i
  x \<in>\<^sub>i I

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. horner_eval' f x (0::'a) n \<in>\<^sub>i horner_eval' g I 0 n
by (rule horner_eval'_interval) (auto simp: set_of_eq)
end
